hits.profile:
# 🥇 Personne recherchée\*
Nous recherchons des personnes à la tête bien faite, ayant la **capacité** et surtout **la volonté d'apprendre**.
Ton profil correspondra parfaitement à notre recherche si : 

**Expérience**
- Tu as déjà 1 ou 2 **expériences significatives** en stage et cherches idéalement ton stage de fin d'études.
- Tu es entrain de terminer tes études dans une **top école de commerce**.
- Tu as évolué dans une start-up, ou dans l'un des domaines suivants : marketing digital, conseil, ecommerce.
- Tu as un intérêt marqué pour le growth hacking et le marketing digital plus largement.

**Soft skills**
- Tu aimes être **autonome** dans ton travail.
- Tu es **perfectionniste** et tu as l'envie de bien faire. Tu es à l'aise avec l'idée de donner et de recevoir du feedback.
- Tu aimes **résoudre des problèmes** de manière structurée et cadrée. Tu as de bonnes **capacités rédactionnelles**.
- Tu as un **esprit entrepreneurial** et souhaite participer à l'aventure d'une entreprise en forte croissance et apprendre de nouvelles méthodes de travail.
- Tu es **à l'aise à l'oral** et sais être convaincant(e).

**Hard skills**
- Tu as une première expérience dans la gestion les principaux leviers d'acquisition payante (Google, Facebook), à défaut, tu n'as pas peur d'apprendre.
- Tu disposes d'une forte **capacité d'analyse** et tu maîtrises excel / google sheets. Tu sais manipuler et interpréter un grand volume de données. Tu sais décomposer un problème pour le résoudre efficacement.
_\*Si tu ne "coches pas toutes les cases" mentionnées ci-dessus et que l'opportunité t'intéresse, rien de dramatique, la liste est ni exhaustive ni exclusive._

# 📆  Disponibilité
- Dès Décembre 2024

hits.name: Head of Enterprise & Indirect Sales

organization.name: Welcome to the Jungle
organization.description:
Welcome to the Jungle is shaping the future of work, leveraging content and technology to revolutionize every aspect of the employee experience. We assist companies in providing a better, more sustainable workplace experience.

Today, over 5,500 companies across various industries showcase their workplace culture on Welcome to the Jungle through exclusive content, team photos, interviews, and key statistics. Our objective is to enable companies to present themselves with increased transparency, allowing candidates to gain a deeper understanding of their people and culture.

Nearly **2.5 million unique visitors actively explore companies, apply for jobs, and engage with our original media and content each month**. Our impact extends beyond the platform, resonating with a community of **1.7 million followers** across various social media platforms.

hits.profile:
**Required Qualifications:** 
• 10+ years of experience in Indirect Sales & Enterprise sales  
• Proven track record of building and scaling both Enterprise & Indirect Sales organizations  
• Strong strategic thinking and business acumen with P&L management experience  
• Demonstrated success in international business development • Experience in designing and implementing partner programs and Enterprise sales strategies  
• Strong executive presence and stakeholder management skills • Track record of driving revenue growth through multiple channels  
• Experience in managing and developing high-performing teams  
• Deep understanding of the HR tech/recruitment industry (preferred)

This role represents a unique opportunity to shape WTTJ's growth strategy through both direct and indirect channels, requiring a leader who can balance strategic vision with operational excellence across both Indirect Sales development and Enterprise sales execution.

hits.name: Growth Hacker
benefits: Accès aux personnes à mobilité réduite
hits.profile:
**Compétences clés**

* Expertise en acquisition de leads : SEO, SEM, LinkedIn, Meta et campagnes outbound.
    
* Maîtrise des outils de suivi et d’analyse de données marketing (Hubspot Sales & Marketing, Google Analytics, etc.).
    
* Solides compétences en copywriting pour des emails engageants et performants en prospection et en inbound
    
* Capacité à adopter une approche centrée sur le client pour adapter les stratégies.
    
* Forte capacité analytique et organisationnelles, avec une approche rigoureuse des données pour la prise de décision.
    

**Soft skills recherchées**

* Curiosité, créativité et analytique.
    
* Capacité à travailler dans un environnement en constante évolution.
    
* Excellentes compétences en communication écrite et orale.
    
* Tempérament dynamique
    

**Votre expérience**

* 4 ans + d’expérience en marketing de croissance dans une structure de type startup
    
* Une expérience/appétence pour le secteur de l’immo ou en Saas B2B serait fortement appréciée
    
* Expérience réussie dans la gestion et le développement d’une équipe.

hits.name: Fullstack Software Engineer – .NET/C# & Front End - CDI (H/F/NB) / Paris

organization.name: D-EDGE Hospitality Solutions
organization.description:
Have you ever booked a hotel online? Then you've probably already used D-EDGE without knowing it. D-EDGE is the leading European and the third-largest global provider of hotel distribution technology. What does that mean?

We assist over 17,000 hotels everyday to develop their online visibility and bookings  through a range of SaaS applications and digital marketing services.

We are nearly 600 D-EDGERS, all passionate individuals, who are reinventing hotel reservations for both travelers and hoteliers. Our mission is to simplify the lives of independent hotels as well as hotel chains.

new_profession.sub_category_name: Développement de logiciels et de sites Web

hits.profile:
**⭐WHAT YOU’VE GOT:**

We are looking for engineers who are passionate about **modern SaaS platforms**, love tackling technical challenges, and thrive in agile environments. Here's what we're seeking:

**Core Requirements**:

* At least 3 years' professional experience as a fullstack Developer
    
* Proven expertise in **.NET/C# development** with a track record of delivering high-quality solutions.
    
* Hands-on experience in **refactoring legacy systems into microservices** architectures.
    
* Solid understanding of **cloud environments** (AWS or Azure) and **containerization tools** (Docker, Kubernetes).
    
* Confirmed experience with **front-end frameworks** like React (ideal), Vue.js, Angular, Javascript or WPF.
    
* Proficiency in **production management**, including CI/CD pipelines and incident resolution.
    

**Preferred Qualifications**:

* Knowledge of **service bus architectures**, event-driven systems, and distributed systems design.
    
* Strong practice of **Agile methodologies (SCRUM/KANBAN)**.
    
* Ability to design software architectures that prioritize **security, reliability, and performance**.
    
* Fluency in English (written and oral) with excellent communication skills.
    

**Soft Skills**:

* A strong sense of autonomy and initiative with the ability to introduce and adapt to new languages, technologies, and work methodologies.
    
* A collaborative spirit with a genuine passion for sharing knowledge and improving team expertise.
    
    **🚀 WHY JOIN US?**
    
* Be part of a transformative journey, modernizing our platform with cutting-edge technologies.
    
* Work with a passionate, skilled, and collaborative team in a flexible and dynamic environment.
    
* Contribute to impactful projects used daily by thousands of users in the hospitality industry.
    
    **💜 WHY YOU’LL LOVE US:**
    
* **Remote Friendly:** Two days in the office, three days remotely.
    
* **Remote Allowance:** 2.60€ per day, up to three days per week.
    
* **Transport Coverage:** 50% of transport costs from home to work.
    
* **Meal Allowance:** 9.48€ per day, paid at 60%.
    
* **Accor Employee Card:** Discounts on hotel bookings.
    
* **CSE Benefits:** Access to sports and cultural activities, gift cards, and various discounts.
    
* **Career Development:** Opportunities for career growth and internal moves.

name.value: Fullstack Software Engineer – .NET/C# & Front End - CDI (H/F/NB) / Paris

organization.name: D-EDGE Hospitality Solutions
organization.description:
Have you ever booked a hotel online? Then you've probably already used D-EDGE without knowing it. D-EDGE is the leading European and the third-largest global provider of hotel distribution technology. What does that mean?

We assist over 17,000 hotels everyday to develop their online visibility and bookings  through a range of SaaS applications and digital marketing services.

hits.profile:
**⭐WHAT YOU’VE GOT:**

* **3-5+ years of hands-on Product design**, with a majority of Software/Saas projects. You’re a T-shaped designer, with a broad range of skills and some specialisations. A demonstrating portfolio is appreciated.
    
* **User-centric mindset**: You have a strong appetite to understand user needs, supported by operational user research skills, and you're committed to crafting solutions that truly address user pain points.
    
* **Problem-solving ability**: You excel at breaking down complex problems and finding innovative, user-driven solutions.
    
* **High level of craft**: Your attention to detail and design quality is second to none, ensuring a polished and refined user experience.
    
* **Proficiency with design tools**: You’re skilled with design software, especially Figma (with no surprise, we’re currently operating on Figma) and prioritise automation and standardisation to enhance efficiency.
    
* **Strong collaboration**: You thrive in cross-functional teams, communicating effectively to ensure alignment and user-centric outcomes.
    
* **Fluent in English**: You’re comfortable working in an international context, collaborating in English on a day-to-day basis.
    
* **Design-engineering mindset**: You bring a structured, organised, and logical approach to your work, ensuring solutions are both creative and technically [sound.](http://sound.bonus/)
    
* **Bonus:** Experience with front-end technologies and accessibility compliance is a plus.
    

**💜 WHY YOU’LL LOVE US:**

* Remote Friendly: Two days in the office, three days remotely.
    
* Remote Allowance: 2.60€ per day, up to three days per week.
    
* Transport Coverage: 50% of transport costs from home to work.
    
* Meal Allowance: 9.48€ per day, paid at 60%
    
* Accor Employee Card: Discounts on hotel bookings.
    
* Incentives: Bonus plans, wage savings, and a variety of incentives.
    
* CSE Benefits: Access to sports and cultural activities, gift cards, and various discounts.
    
* Volunteer Opportunities: Access to a network of certified nonprofits to get involved in.
    
* Career Development: Opportunities for career growth and internal moves

organization.name: D-EDGE Hospitality Solutions
organization.description:
Have you ever booked a hotel online? Then you've probably already used D-EDGE without knowing it. D-EDGE is the leading European and the third-largest global provider of hotel distribution technology. What does that mean?

We assist over 17,000 hotels everyday to develop their online visibility and bookings  through a range of SaaS applications and digital marketing services.

We are nearly 600 D-EDGERS, all passionate individuals, who are reinventing hotel reservations for both travelers and hoteliers. Our mission is to simplify the lives of independent hotels as well as hotel chains.

hits.profile:
We are looking to accelerate our growth in France. To achieve this goal, we are seeking a Business Developer based in Paris.

Within the sales team, you will leverage your strong entrepreneurial spirit to identify and generate sales opportunities through multiple channels and manage the entire sales cycle in the region:

### **🚀 Missions :**

* Proactively prospect and qualify incoming leads to generate new business opportunities.
    
* Establish and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including C-level executives.
    
* Understand prospects’ objectives and develop strategies to offer relevant solutions that help them achieve their goals.
    
* Precisely manage your sales pipeline and keep the CRM up-to-date.
    
* Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and functions to enhance visibility and brand recognition.
    

### **❤️ What we are looking for :**

* You are fluent in English & French
    
* You have at least 5 years of experience in a similar role within a SaaS company, ideally within Travel Technology.
    
* You have a “Hunter” mentality - You are persistent in prospecting and following up with prospects and motivated to close deals.
    
* You are performance-oriented - You have experience with sales KPIs and revenue targets.
    
* You are autonomous, persevering, and capable of working independently to achieve individual monthly business goals.
    
* You demonstrate initiative in improving of the B2B sales process
    

### **🤗 What we offer :**

Joining LoungeUp isn’t just joining a team, it’s stepping into a vibrant community of young professionals, within a thriving and expanding company. With us, you’ll find an atmosphere that nurtures individual growth and empowers you to reach your personal aspirations.

* In addition to that we offer :
    
    * Attractive fixed salary plus uncapped commissions
        
    * Location: Great office in downtown Paris
        
    * Meal vouchers (Swile),
        
    * Health care insurance (Axa), public transport pass

You’re a T-shaped designer, with a broad range of skills and some specialisations. A demonstrating portfolio is appreciated.
    
* **High standard level of craft.** Rigour and obsession with detail will be key for the role.
    
* **Proficient with design software** with a particular attention to automation and standardisation (no surprises, we’re currently operating on Figma) 
    
* **Design-engineering and analytical mindset**. Your core skills and strengths are around structure, organisation and logic.
    
* **Strong cross-functional collaboration** **Communication skillsFluent in English**: You’re comfortable working in an international context, collaborating in English on a day-to-day basis.
    
* **Bonus:** experience with front-end technologies and accessibility compliance.
    

**💜 WHY YOU’LL LOVE US:**

* Remote Friendly: Two days in the office, three days remotely.
    
* Remote Allowance: 2.60€ per day, up to three days per week.
    
* Transport Coverage: 50% of transport costs from home to work.
    
* Meal Allowance: 9.48€ per day, paid at 60%
    
* Accor Employee Card: Discounts on hotel bookings.
    
* Incentives: Bonus plans, wage savings, and a variety of incentives.

hits.name: Stage Sales Development Representative (H/F) - Keycoopt - Lille
benefits: Formations sur le temps de travail
hits.profile:
Tu suis actuellement une formation commerciale ou marketing (Bac +3 ou Bac +5).

Tu es smart et capable d’échanger avec des clients grands groupes et des interlocuteurs de haut niveau.

Tu as une appétence pour le Growth hacking, tant mieux, nous cherchons à dynamiser notre stratégie commerciale !  
  
Tu es notre pépite si :

\-          Tu es enthousiaste : avoir envie et conscience de participer à une aventure littéralement (et en toute objectivité !) passionnante et véritablement innovante, dans laquelle toute l’équipe s’investit à fond.

\-          Tu as l’âme d’un(e) chasseur(se) et négociateur(trice), tu as une appétence commerciale indéniable, tu n’as pas peur de décrocher ton téléphone, tu as une bonne compréhension des problématiques digitales, tu sais détecter des opportunités et les mener à leurs termes.

\-          Tu es dynamique, persévérant(e), pugnace et doté(e) d’un fort esprit d’analyse et une capacité de synthèse, tu es motivé(e) par les challenges et très orienté(e) résultats.

\-          Tu gardes constamment un œil sur l’objectif, le résultat, et as envie de tout mettre en œuvre pour l’atteindre.

\-          Tu as des idées, tu n’as pas peur de les exposer, de les défendre, de les tester.

\-          Tu as envie de t’investir dans un projet qui révolutionne les règles du recrutement.

\-          Tu as une appétence forte pour le digital.

\-          La maitrise de l’anglais est nécessaire.

hits.name: BUSINESS DEVELOPER / FUNDRAISER (H/F)
hits.profile:
* Expérience requise : 3 à 5 ans sur des fonctions similaires (business developer, business development representative, fundraiser…) avec **des preuves de résultats probants**.
    
* Maîtrise des techniques et outils de *growth marketing* essentielle.
    

* De tempérament dynamique, ouvert et autonome, le ou la candidat·e sait faire preuve de rigueur, d'organisation, de persévérance et de polyvalence. 
    
* Curieux, orienté résultat, ROIste avec une bonne compréhension des mécanismes d’un funnel commercial.
    
* Qualités relationnelles naturelles indispensables.
    
* A une bonne compréhension ou un intérêt réel pour les enjeux RSE des entreprises et le monde de l’ESS.
    
* Excellentes capacités de communication orale et écrite.
    
* Capacité et intérêt à travailler dans un environnement entrepreneurial international en évolution permanente.
    
* Réelle maîtrise de l'anglais indispensable, à l'oral comme à l'écrit.
    
* Parfaite maîtrise de la Google Suite.
    
* Seraient un plus appréciable : la connaissance et la maîtrise de Salesforce et Canva.

hits.name: Stage - Growth Ops
hits.profile:
* Idéalement étudiant(e) en Master en école de commerce/ingénieur ou à l'université, vous recherchez un stage de 6 mois dans une entreprise dynamique et ambitieuse
    
* Avoir de l'expérience sur les sujets growth, en conseil ou en tant que commercial
    
* Analytique avec une approche axée sur la donnée
    
* Organisé et autonome, capable de chercher des solutions si tu te trouves face à une nouvelle difficulté
    
* Bon communiquant, capable de travailler en équipe, de récolter des besoins et des idées, de les exposer
    
* Tu maitrises HubSpot et d'autres outils no-code (Notion, Zapier, Make, salesNavigator, Lemlist)
    
* La connaissance de SQL et le fonctionnement des APIs est également un plus
    
* Tu recherches ton stage de césure ou de fin d’études, avec embauche potentielle à la clé

hits.name: Growth Marketing Manager
hits.profile:
* Tu as une solide expérience en marketing digital et en gestion de marque
    
* Tu es créatif et tu es capable de mettre en œuvre des stratégies marketing performantes et différenciantes
    
* Tu as d'excellentes qualités de rédaction / copywriting
    
* Tu as une expertise technique sur les principaux leviers d'acquisition en ligne (SEO, SEA, réseaux sociaux...)

hits.profile:
**Expérience**

* Tu as une première expérience en SEO
    
* Tu es passionné par le digital et les enjeux techniques du SEO
    

**Tu es la personne qu'il nous faut si :**

* Tu as des notions en SEO et/ou en développement de site web
    
* Tu es à l’aise avec les chiffres et tu as une forte capacité d’analyse
    
* Tu veux mettre les mains dans le cambouis et avoir un impact direct sur le business de tes clients
    
* Tu te reconnais dans les traits de caractère suivants : rigoureux, proactif, autonome et à l’écoute
    
* Tu as bien lu l’offre et tu as remarqué que datashake ne prend pas de majuscule
    

**Travailler chez datashake :**

Nos 10 valeurs : data, challenge, bienveillance, leadership, confiance, professionnalisme & réactivité, innovation, qualité de service, entraide, respect.

C’est en se challengeant que l’on grandit, le feedback est inhérent à la culture datashake.

En résumé, datashake, c’est de l’ambition et de la bienveillance. Nous faisons attention à ce que chaque nouvelle recrue apprenne et grandisse afin d’exprimer tout son potentiel.

**Les avantages**

* Un programme de formation complet pour que tu deviennes un as de l’acquisition et de l’analyse de données
    
* Des teambuildings, des restos, des apéros, des partie de Mario Kart et des parties de Uno
    
* Thé, boissons, fruits, snacks à volonté (on aime le thé, mais on reste ouverts)
    
* Bureaux dans le 17ème arrondissement
    
* Accès à un réseau de salles de sport via Gymlib
    
* Accès à de nombreuses promotions via HappyPal
    
* La possibilité de faire du télétravail
    
* Titres resto Swile
    
* Mutuelle Alan

organization.name: ToucanToco
organization.description:
Toucan is a customer-facing analytics platform that empowers companies to drive engagement with data storytelling. With the best customizable end-user experience across any device, over 4 million Toucan stories are viewed each year. Toucan’s no-code, cloud-based platform cuts development costs and time to value with a fast, seamless implementation.

You’ll be joining a caring team, located in France and in the United States, who is helping companies provide easy-to-use, actionable and collaborative customer-facing analytics experiences.

Don’t just take our word for it:
[Check out our reviews on GlassDoor](https://www.glassdoor.fr/Avis/Toucan-Toco-Avis-E1302977.htm)
[Check out our reviews on G2 ](https://www.g2.com/products/toucan/reviews).


Our Mission & Vision:
To power the world’s most engaging customer experiences with data and to make customer-facing analytics easily deployable with the highest scalability and the best end user experience.

new_profession.category_name: Vente et service à la clientèle

hits.profile:
**PROFILE**

* You are **not afraid to pick up the phone** to conquer your targets and get as many meetings as possible for your Field Sales.
    
* You understand digital marketing and its business development challenges.
    
* Pragmatic, you know when to say **"done is better than perfect"**.
    

**ATTITUDE**

* Pragmatic and resourceful, **you're a “doer”** = you do things, quick and well. Even if you have to correct it afterwards.
    
* You are convinced of the **impact** that data presentation can have
    
* **Creative, curious and autonomous, you are ambitious** and want to participate to a start-up growth
    
* You want to progress **in the contact of performing individuals**
    
* You use Digital Tools efficiently

**Votre profil :**

Vous justifiez d’au moins **2 ans** d’expérience dans un poste similaire et avez une solide expertise en SEO et webmarketing.

Vous êtes rigoureux(se) et organisé(e), avec une excellente capacité rédactionnelle et une parfaite maîtrise des enjeux sémantiques.

Votre capacité d’analyse et votre aisance à suivre les performances seront essentielles dans ce poste. La maîtrise des outils SEO est indispensable pour réussir dans cette mission.

Le poste est ouvert à toute personne en situation de handicap.

hits.profile:
We're meant to meet and grow together if ... 

You have 5-8 years of experience as a Product Manager, with a proven track record of driving business impact. You have successfully managed complex data-driven projects, involving multiple backend systems, and optimizing for cost, business KPIs (such as margin), and user experience (such as speed). With a strong ability to blend strategic and operational approaches, you turn product vision into business growth. You excel at setting priorities, tracking KPIs, and delivering measurable results aligned with company objectives. Expertise in air transport is a plus. 

You're attracted by new technologies and the idea of participating in the management of a product's lifecycle fascinates you.  

You have a strong analytical mind, you like to think and act, and you know how to communicate your ideas and choices effectively based on sound data. You're at ease with figures and know how to synthesize them. 

You are fluent in English and French.

organization.name: Bitstack
organization.description:
Bitstack is building a new neobank powered by Bitcoin. Bitstack has gone from a simple product that turns your spare change into bitcoin to a bitcoin-native neobank that is bringing a better way to manage all things money, with better money. We believe getting started with Bitcoin should be simple, fun and accessible to everyone.

Bitstack is backed by YC, leading VCs like Stillmark, Serena, Plug and Play, ALM Innovation (AG2R La Mondiale), Founders Future, Goodwater Capital, Kima Ventures, Station F, and angels from companies like Ledger, Alan, Swile and more. We are building a product our users love and we are just getting started!

Bitcoin is an unparalleled financial alternative: a radically new way to transact and store value all around the world. It is a new kind of currency that isn't centrally controlled by any business, government or bank and that cannot be debased. Bitcoin will redefine the future of finance, from payments to savings, and wealth preservation. It is the first open and borderless monetary network with a fixed supply of 21 million, making bitcoin the most scarce financial asset ever.

hits.profile:
### Skills we are excited about ⭐

We are looking for people that are genuinely friendly and ambitious.

* Experienced - 3+ years of relevant CS operations work, ideally within a fintech or tech environment, with product/project management experience
* Bilingual - Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both French and English
* Caring and Empathetic - you are attentive to understanding our customers’ issues or concerns and have a passion for ensuring an outstanding customer experience
* Leader & Team player - you are humble, open to challenge, and like to help others grow with the ability to effectively influence and communicate cross-functionally
* Owner mentality - You like to take initiative and find new creative solutions to problems with expertise in balancing and articulating trade-offs
* Perpetual learner - You are excited about talking to users, partners, learning about personal finance and Bitcoin in general

### Bonus points 📈

* You are passionate about Bitcoin & personal finance
* You want to work in a fast-paced, high-growth startup environment

hits.name: Consultant(e) SEO expérimenté(e)
hits.profile:
Nous cherchons des personnes curieuses, passionnées par le SEO et capables de s’adapter à des environnements variés.

**Comment savoir si ce poste est fait pour toi ?**

* Tu as une expérience significative et réussie en agence SEO ou chez l’annonceur
    
* Tu aimes partager ton savoir et transmettre ta passion pour le SEO et le numérique
    
* Tu as déjà joué un rôle de chef de projet SEO
    
* Tu possèdes un excellent relationnel que ce soit pour travailler en équipe ou pour convaincre tes interlocuteurs
    

**Le profil de nos rêves ?**

* Diplôme Bac +2 à Bac +5.
    
* Maîtrise de l’anglais (un vrai plus !).
    
* Solides notions en marketing, culture web et SEO.
    
* Certifications CESEO, Analytics ou compétences techniques en langage Web appréciées.
    

Chez nous, si tu aimes écrire sur ton métier, tu pourras contribuer à notre **newsletter interne**, un espace ouvert à toutes les plumes passionnées !

* * *

### **ET SI C’ÉTAIT TOI ?**

Rejoindre notre agence, c’est intégrer un environnement ambitieux, dynamique et convivial. Alors, prêt(e) à relever le défi ?

Envoie-nous ta candidature et partage tes expériences : qu’elles touchent de près ou de loin au référencement naturel, nous sommes impatients de découvrir tes talents et d’échanger avec toi lors d’un entretien.

organization.name: Joko
organization.description:
We help consumers shop smarter. Our ambition is to revolutionize the way people shop, empowering them to find what they need, make informed purchasing decisions, and save money.

Joko is a tech company founded in Paris. Our team of over 50 talents is international and spread across offices in Paris, Barcelona and New York, or working remotely.

As a certified B Corporation, we are committed to making a difference in the lives of the communities we serve, including the 4 million consumers already using Joko to save money every day at over 7,000 merchants.

Over the years, we have quickly expanded our value proposition to enable consumers to make smarter shopping decisions through many features: cash back, buy now and pay later, automatic coupons, price drop alerts, carbon footprint tracking, and more. Today, we are dedicating significant resources to developing an AI-powered assistant that helps users find the right product based on their criteria for price, quality, or environmental impact from the global e-commerce catalog.

After reaching profitability in our core market, we are now expanding internationally with a primary focus on the US. 

It’s still day 1; come build the future of shopping with us!

hits.name: Growth Partnerships & Influence Manager
hits.profile:
* **Location:** You are located in France.
    
* **Experience**: You have 2-5y experience, ideally including external partnerships.
    
* **Languages:** You are fluent in French (because our partners would mostly be French for now) and English (as our team is international), both written and spoken.
    
* **Communication**: You have strong written and verbal communication skills, and you are able to explain something complex with simple words.
    
* **Interpersonal skills**: You have great interpersonal skills and are always eager to build new relationships and feed them with regular and qualitative contacts.
    
* **Curiosity**. You are very curious and enthusiastic about emerging trends, channels, and technologies, especially the social media and influencers’ market.
    
* **Creativity.** You enjoy imagining new approaches to achieve your goals and coming-up with creative ideas to test.
    
* **Analytical skills:** You love solving complex problems and analyzing data to drive actionable insights and initiatives.
    
* **Mindset**: You have an entrepreneurial mindset, you like challenges and getting hands-on.
    
* **Attention to details**: You know that the devil is in the details, and you have a talent for spotting flaws if there are any.
    
* **Efficiency**: You are fond of productivity tools and able to deliver on time on projects with many stakeholders.

hits.name: Head of Legal

organization.name: Joko
organization.description:
We help consumers shop smarter. Our ambition is to revolutionize the way people shop, empowering them to find what they need, make informed purchasing decisions, and save money.

Joko is a tech company founded in Paris. Our team of over 50 talents is international and spread across offices in Paris, Barcelona and New York, or working remotely.

As a certified B Corporation, we are committed to making a difference in the lives of the communities we serve, including the 4 million consumers already using Joko to save money every day at over 7,000 merchants.

Over the years, we have quickly expanded our value proposition to enable consumers to make smarter shopping decisions through many features: cash back, buy now and pay later, automatic coupons, price drop alerts, carbon footprint tracking, and more. Today, we are dedicating significant resources to developing an AI-powered assistant that helps users find the right product based on their criteria for price, quality, or environmental impact from the global e-commerce catalog.

After reaching profitability in our core market, we are now expanding internationally with a primary focus on the US. 

It’s still day 1; come build the future of shopping with us!

hits.profile:
We’re looking for a seasoned legal professional with a business mindset and a passion for enabling innovation. The ideal candidate will have:

* **Experience**: At least 8+ years of experience in a legal role, ideally including in-house counsel in a fast-growing tech company or startup.
    
* **Expertise**: Strong knowledge of commercial, corporate, and regulatory law, with a focus on GDPR and consumer protection in a digital context.
    
* **Leadership Skills**: Proven ability to build, lead, and inspire a legal team, as well as collaborate effectively across departments.
    
* **Business Acumen**: A proactive, business-oriented approach to solving legal challenges, with a track record of enabling growth and innovation while managing risk.
    
* **Problem-Solving**: A hands-on, pragmatic approach to complex legal issues with the ability to balance legal requirements and business goals.
    
* **Communication**: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to present complex legal concepts in a clear and accessible manner to non-legal stakeholders.
    
* **Education**: A law degree and qualification to practice in at least one European jurisdiction;
    
* **Languages:** You are fluent in French and English, both written and spoken, as we are expanding internationally.
    

### Our perks

We believe that flexibility and trust are important parts of a company. Our work environment reflects this thanks to:

* **Flexible remote**: If you live in Paris, you can work from our office or from your place with no constraints. If you live elsewhere, you can get access to a coworking space.
    
* **Work from anywhere**: Do you want to travel to Italy for a month and work from there? For up to 3 months a year, you may work from most countries in the world.
    

On top of that, we offer many perks such as:

* a budget for **remote work equipment**
    
* a **ClassPass** subscription for you to stay in shape wherever you are
    
* premium **health insurance** (Alan Blue in France)
    
* a **Swile** card for your meals, if you are based in France
    
* frequent **team events and in-person gatherings** every quarter!
    
* and so much more, see [here](https://notion.so/joko/20f4ead2bfc54137b9d805bd9abbb758?pvs=4&v=e2baac50c1844149a219895e0d1c2912) ⏪

Qualifications and Skills:

  • Scientific communication skills, a must.
  • Proficient in Written & Oral English.
  • Interpersonal skills to engage effectively with team members, fostering collaboration and a positive work environment.
  • Strong Interest in digital training tools, platforms, and AI-driven solutions

What We Offer:

  • A dynamic and inclusive work environment within a globally recognized leader in healthcare.
  • International exposure and the chance to work across diverse therapeutic areas
  • Opportunities for professional growth and development : internal mobility is encouraged
  • Ability to work in a global, multicultural environment and adapt training approaches accordingly, with sensitivity to regional differences.

Ready to Join Us ?

organization.name: WINAMAX
organization.description:
Winamax is a dynamic, innovative company that is pushing the boundaries of the online gambling industry. With 350,000 players and 500,000 bettors a month respectively, Winamax is the leader in poker and sports betting in France. Our identity is based on creativity, daring and festivity: "work hard play harder" could have been written for Winamax! We are committed to offering our players an exceptional experience, combining cutting-edge technology, exciting entertainment and increasingly high-quality services.

Located in the heart of Paris, our premises and the various benefits on offer (gym, group lessons, massages, barbecues all summer long, regular parties, etc.) make our company a truly atypical workplace. Together, in one place, our shared passion for games and our international culture, influenced by our Spanish, Portuguese and German teams, are the real strength of our company.

Come and experience our passion for games with us!

hits.name: CMO - Directeur.trice Marketing (Part-time)
hits.profile:
### **Expérience et compétences clés :**

* **Expérience marketing solide :**
    
    * 7 ans d'expérience minimum, avec une exposition significative aux stratégies digitales,
        
    * idéalement en B2C et B2B
        
    * en start-up ou scale-up,
        
    * plutôt orienté “growth” (inbound, outbound, ABM…) et revenu.
        
* **Leadership d’équipe :** Capacité à diriger, motiver et faire évoluer une petite équipe, tout en gérant efficacement les priorités.
    
* **Compétences en acquisition et performance :** Expertise dans l’élaboration de campagnes digitales (SEA, social ads, funnels, VSL), avec une approche orientée data et résultats.
    
* **Vision stratégique :** Capacité à définir et structurer une stratégie marketing globale en tenant compte des spécificités B2C et B2B.
    
* **Rigueur et organisation :** Méthodique, capable de jongler avec plusieurs projets simultanément, de fixer des priorités claires et de respecter les deadlines.
    
* **Maîtrise des outils technologiques :** À l’aise avec les CRM, outils de marketing automation et plateformes publicitaires. Une appétence pour le Nocode/Lowcode et l’IA est un atout.
    
* Une familiarité avec les secteurs de l’éducation, de la tech, ou des services est un plus.
    

### **Soft skills et état d'esprit :**

* **Orienté résultat :** Capacité à fixer des objectifs mesurables, suivre les performances et ajuster les stratégies pour maximiser l’impact.
    
* **Esprit entrepreneurial :** Capacité à innover, tester des idées nouvelles et adopter une approche "hacker" pour générer de la croissance.
    
* **Communication claire :** Excellentes compétences interpersonnelles, avec la capacité d’interagir avec des parties prenantes variées, internes comme externes.
    
* **Passion pour l’éducation et la tech :** Intérêt marqué pour les secteurs de l’éducation et des nouvelles technologies, avec une envie de contribuer à leur développement.
    
* **Adaptabilité :** À l’aise dans un environnement dynamique et en constante évolution, avec la capacité de prioriser en fonction des besoins changeants..

hits.name: Senior full-stack developer (Front-end focused)

new_profession.sub_category_name: Développement de logiciels et de sites Web

hits.profile:
* You’ve **at least 3 years of experience on a product experiencing rapid-growth** — your work is well-crafted and well-tested for scale.
    
* You have **frontend expertise** — though you’d still consider yourself full-stack.
    
* You can **readily learn most technologies** as you go. To you, technologies are about tools and tradeoffs, not an ideology.
    
* You **care about the business implications** of anything you build. You’re not just going after cool stuff — you understand the balance between craft, speed, and the bottom line.
    

**Nice to have**

* You’re **fluent with Ruby and React**
    

### **👐 What you’ll get…**

**🌍 International :** we acknowledge our differences and celebrate them. D&I in our place of work is something we require every employee to champion.

**🧸 People-centric company :** our people matter. Check out our [**benefits and perks**](https://www.welcometothejungle.com/en/companies/shipup/lesplus-1) for a healthy work environment. Work-life balance is important at Shipup; hear what our employees have to say about it [**here**](https://www.glassdoor.fr/Avis/Shipup-Avis-E1685543.htm).

🗃 **Startup spirit & structured environment :** a place where you can learn within a well-organized and clear business setting.

📚 **Career growth :** talent management is essential for us. From onboarding and performance management to career development, we have already a mature organization and the managers to help you grow

🧠 **Seniority :** our team is mostly composed of senior talents, ideal for learning and growing quickly

organization.name: Shipup
organization.description:
Shipup is a SaaS that tracks e-commerce orders and deliveries in real time to create a branded, reassuring, and flawless post-purchase experience. Shipup currently collaborates with over 500 brands in Europe and North America, including some of the most remarkable success stories in e-commerce, such as Yves Rocher, Cheerz, Lights4Fun, Printemps, Carrefour, Respire, Withings, Blissim, Purple Carrot, Beerwulf and more.

Today, It’s a team of more than 50 members that is dedicated to the mission of transforming the post-purchase experience.

hits.name: Head of B2B Marketing

* Deep expertise in digital marketing, including SEM, SEO, content marketing, social media, email campaigns, and data-driven marketing.
    
* Experience leading small marketing teams and working closely with sales, product, and data teams.
    
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to translate data into actionable insights and optimize campaigns for maximum impact.
    
* Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.
    
* Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, high-growth environment and adapt to changing market conditions.
    
* A passion for innovation and a results-driven mindset.

* **Compétences solides en SEO** : stratégie, architecture de site, et optimisation des contenus.
    
* Esprit entrepreneurial, mindset orienté solutions et performance, avec une forte capacité à travailler en autonomie.
    

**Ce poste n’est pas fait pour toi si :**

Une expérience significative en growth marketing ou marketing digital hors stage et alternance est nécessaire pour répondre aux enjeux de ce poste.

Tu n’as pas une maîtrise technique des outils publicitaires et des campagnes SEO, ou si tu n’es pas à l’aise avec un rôle demandant une grande autonomie et des responsabilités stratégiques.

Tu es disponible dans plus de 3 mois.

* Maîtrise des outils SEO (SEMRrush, Google Search Console, Google Analytics)
    
* Autonomie, persévérance et minutie.
